Who are we?
-
As Hello Minaste (Extension Idea Producer), the healing and peace of nature; 
We were founded in 2019 to offer people who miss nature as a unique experience. We produce and process bunches of incense, wood incense and healing crystals, which are frequently used in Anatolian, South American and Eastern cultures, by hand. We do not use chemicals such as perfume, paraben, gunpowder, coal dust in any of our products. Our products are not produced in factories or machines. It consists entirely of hand workmanship. We stay away from industrialization and mass production. Because what makes us special is that each of our products is produced by hand.

We offer niche products for corporate companies and various organizations as well as retail sales with a high seller score. We prepare all orders "as if they are ready for our loved ones". Thus, we are constantly reaching more people. We know that the best advertisement is for our customer to recommend us to someone else.

Our customers use these unique products in meditation and breathing exercises, yoga sessions, times that require concentration and creativity, when they start a fresh start or when they want to change the energy of the environment.

We are very happy to be able to protect nature, support drug-free agriculture and show you a little bit of the spirit of the universe!

Hope you open your heart to the possibilities of the universe!
